item.title: MIUI V13.0.12.0.RLDCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12X China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12X China

Codename: psyche

Version: V13.0.12.0.RLDCNXM | 11.0

Size: 5.9 GB

MD5: 3c80f8029e08bf92d7775c5dfee82950

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to December 2021. Increased system security.
[Widgets]
Fix: Clock widget wasn't displayed correctly
[Mi AI voice assistant]
Optimization: Wake with voice
[Other]
Optimization: Auto brightness
Optimization: Fingerprint unlock
Fix: Noise appeared occasionally during audio playback

Download: Here
